Base:Description.spring: Supple stalks of bright green grass merge with briar and tangled undergrowth as the plain gives way to dense forest. Sunlight sprinkles through the shadow cast by verdant new leaves.Moonlight pierces through the canopy of the trees and washes the surrounding grassland in a pale glow.
Base:Description.summer: Tall, thick stalks of grass weave in undulating patterns that kiss the edge of the dense forest like tidal waves brush the shore. The bright summer sun warms the fields of grass but is unable to penetrate the heavy foliage of the forest canopy.Starry skies above the fields are blocked from view by the heavy foliage of the forest, the glow of moonlight lost to the impenetrable darkness of the surrounding woodland.
Base:Description.autumn: Golden waves of grass wave and bob in the breeze, rustling softly as they merge with the autumnal forest nearby. The sun washes the forest floor with rich, rose gold light as it filters through the leaves turned red, orange, yellow and brown.The thinning canopy of colorful leaves allow the moon glow to infuse the undergrowth with a pale silver light that spills out over the swaying dry grasses of the plain.
Base:Description.winter: Dry, frost-bitten stalks of grass lie over the ground in a thick woven mat, tangling with the heavy undergrowth where field merges with forest. The sun light angles low through the bare canopy and washes over both field and forest floor, but does little to free the air from the biting chill of winter.The starry skies are visible over the fields of dead grass and through the tangle of leafless branches overhead.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ The grasslands undulate in rippling waves. \| A faint rustling is heard among the tall grass. \| You spot a wild dray grazing in the distance. \| Something disrupts the calm of the grass, running through it in a zigzag fashion. \| \A \{colorful \| spotted \| orange \| yellow \| vibrant\} butterfly flutters through, just out of reach.\\A \{bright white \| pale \| off-white \| stark-white \| spotted \} moth flutters through, just out of reach.\ \| Something slithers past your foot. \}

X[S] \{ The grasslands undulate in rippling waves. \| A faint rustling is heard among the tall grass. \| You spot a wild dray grazing in the distance. \| Something disrupts the calm of the grass, running through it in a zigzag fashion. \| \A \{colorful \| spotted \| orange \| yellow \| vibrant\} butterfly flutters through, just out of reach.\\A \{bright white \| pale \| off-white \| stark-white \| spotted \} moth flutters through, just out of reach.\ \| Something slithers past your foot. \}
